summary: A Korean reunification plan is upset by a Japanese invasion plot, revealing a century-old secret between the countries.
cast: Sung-Ki Ahn|Il-seob Baek|In-Pyo Cha|Tae-Hyun Cha|Jae-Hyun Cho|Soo-youn Kang|Eung-soo Kim|Sang-Jung Kim|Yeong-Seon Kim|Han-wi Lee|Kan-hie Lee|Seong-kun Mun|Yong-soo Park|Kang Shin-il|Sang-Jeon Woo
title: Hanbando
